image_2.description: The Lincoln Memorial is a monument in Washington, characterized by large columns and a view towards the National Mall, where visitors found shade during the heat wave.
The Washington Monument is a tall, white obelisk located in the center of the National Mall, surrounded by green grass and people.
The United States Capitol is a large, white building with a prominent dome, located at the far end of the National Mall.
The National Mall is a large open space with green grass, paths, and people walking around, stretching from the Lincoln Memorial to the United States Capitol.
The Reflecting Pool is a long, rectangular pool of water located between the Lincoln Memorial and the Washington Monument.

image_3.description: An old building with a worn facade and a window with plants growing around it, serving as the backdrop for the scene, and is likely related to the buildings under dispute mentioned in the text.

image_4.description: Kharkiv, Ukraine is a location outside of which survivors find solace amidst the war, indicating the impact of the conflict on the area. A desolate apartment complex outside Kharkiv, Ukraine, is where survivors take comfort in one another.

image_5.description: Meryl Streep is a fine actress, known for her use of eyewear in her performances. An older woman with short, white hair styled in an elegant updo, she is wearing a black top and holding the frame of her glasses with her right hand, which has a large green ring on one finger. Her expression is serious and contemplative.

A pair of stylish, rectangular-framed glasses with red accents. The glasses are being held by Meryl Streep, partially obscuring her face, and are part of what makes her a fine actress as mentioned in the article 'What She Sees in Glasses'.
A large, noticeable ring with a green stone worn on Meryl Streep's right hand. It adds to her sophisticated appearance and is part of her distinctive style as an actress.

Several books are arranged on a shelf in the background of the image featuring Meryl Streep, suggesting a setting that could be an office or a library, and adding to the intellectual ambiance of the scene.
